# How to change array type during building
* Build with double type

By default, array type is *double*, and to start program you just need to:

```
mkdir build
cd build
cmake..
make
./array_program.out
```
Results: 

```
Using double type
First 100 elements: 0.000000000 0.000000628 0.000001256 0.000001884 0.000002512 0.000003140 0.000003768 0.000004396 0.000005024 0.000005652 0.000006280 0.000006908 0.000007536 0.000008164 0.000008792 0.000009420 0.000010048 0.000010676 0.000011304 0.000011932 0.000012560 0.000013188 0.000013816 0.000014444 0.000015072 0.000015700 0.000016328 0.000016956 0.000017584 0.000018212 0.000018840 0.000019468 0.000020096 0.000020724 0.000021352 0.000021980 0.000022608 0.000023236 0.000023864 0.000024492 0.000025120 0.000025748 0.000026376 0.000027004 0.000027632 0.000028260 0.000028888 0.000029516 0.000030144 0.000030772 0.000031400 0.000032028 0.000032656 0.000033284 0.000033912 0.000034540 0.000035168 0.000035796 0.000036424 0.000037052 0.000037680 0.000038308 0.000038936 0.000039564 0.000040192 0.000040820 0.000041448 0.000042076 0.000042704 0.000043332 0.000043960 0.000044588 0.000045216 0.000045844 0.000046472 0.000047100 0.000047728 0.000048356 0.000048984 0.000049612 0.000050240 0.000050868 0.000051496 0.000052124 0.000052752 0.000053380 0.000054008 0.000054636 0.000055264 0.000055892 0.000056520 0.000057148 0.000057776 0.000058404 0.000059032 0.000059660 0.000060288 0.000060916 0.000061544 0.000062172 
Sum of first 100 elements: 0.003108600
Sum of all elements: 31399996.86
```

* Build with float type

If you want to change array type to *float*, you just need to add an option during building like this(you should stay in the same directory):

```
rm -rf *
cmake -DUSE_FLOAT=ON ..
make
./array_program.out
```

Results:

```
Using float type
First 100 elements: 0.000000000 0.000000628 0.000001256 0.000001884 0.000002512 0.000003140 0.000003768 0.000004396 0.000005024 0.000005652 0.000006280 0.000006908 0.000007536 0.000008164 0.000008792 0.000009420 0.000010048 0.000010676 0.000011304 0.000011932 0.000012560 0.000013188 0.000013816 0.000014444 0.000015072 0.000015700 0.000016328 0.000016956 0.000017584 0.000018212 0.000018840 0.000019468 0.000020096 0.000020724 0.000021352 0.000021980 0.000022608 0.000023236 0.000023864 0.000024492 0.000025120 0.000025748 0.000026376 0.000027004 0.000027632 0.000028260 0.000028888 0.000029516 0.000030144 0.000030772 0.000031400 0.000032028 0.000032656 0.000033284 0.000033912 0.000034540 0.000035168 0.000035796 0.000036424 0.000037052 0.000037680 0.000038308 0.000038936 0.000039564 0.000040192 0.000040820 0.000041448 0.000042076 0.000042704 0.000043332 0.000043960 0.000044588 0.000045216 0.000045844 0.000046472 0.000047100 0.000047728 0.000048356 0.000048984 0.000049612 0.000050240 0.000050868 0.000051496 0.000052124 0.000052752 0.000053380 0.000054008 0.000054636 0.000055264 0.000055892 0.000056520 0.000057148 0.000057776 0.000058404 0.000059032 0.000059660 0.000060288 0.000060916 0.000061544 0.000062172
```
